page.title: 17SHOPS IN CHINGFORD
page.content: {SHOPS AND SNACKBARS IN STATION ROAD SHOPS HAVE A LOT OF SIGNS IN WINDOWS LIKE '2 CHILDREN AT A TIME','NO DOGS', 'NO EATING SWEETS','SALE' AND ADVERTISING.THERE ARE LOTS OF DIFFERENT SHOPS INCLUDING A FEW NEWSAGENTS.HERE ARE THE SNACKBARS IN STATION ROAD:A BAKER'S WHERE YOU CAN EAT, A KENTUCKY FRIED CHICKEN SHOP, A CHINESE RESTAURANT AND A CHIP SHOP.LOTS OF SHOPS DO NOT OPEN ON CERTAIN DAYS BUT SOME ARE OPEN EVERY DAY OF THE WEEK EXCEPT FOR SUNDAY. THERE ARE A FEW CLOTHES SHOPS AND A FEW SUPERMARKETS BUT THERE ARE NO BIG DEPARTMENT STORES. THERE ARE SIMILAR SHOPS AT CHINGFORD MOUNT AND HIGHAMS PARK. MOST PEOPLE GO TO ONE OF THE LARGE SUPERMARKETS TO DO THEIR WEEKLY FOOD SHOP.MANY PEOPLE BUY CLOTHES AT THE MARKET OR IN THE WEST END.
